title: Super Bowl LIV recap with David Carr!
itunes:title: Super Bowl LIV recap with David Carr!
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined alongside our old pal David Carr to recap the Kansas City Chiefs 31-20 victory over the San Francisco 49ers in Super Bowl LIV! After reviewing the ins and outs of the big game, the Daves kibitzed about Derek Carr's future in Las Vegas (28:50), very early Super Bowl predictions for next season (39:40), if Drew Brees will retire (48:11) and Mike McCarthy getting an unfair label while in Green Bay (54:25).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
